revised_title: Heat-Induced Alterations in Vitreous Rocks: A Study of Pitchstone and Obsidian
tldr: This study examines the changes in pitchstone and obsidian rocks when exposed to heat. The author investigates the effects of dry heat on these rocks, observing changes in their color, structure, and composition. The results provide insights into the petrological significance of these alterations and contribute to the understanding of geological processes.
